name: grip-invest-server
description: Backend API for Grip Invest Platform

scripts.dev:prod-db: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.dev:local: npx cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=3306 DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=grip_invest tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.db:generate:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.db:push:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:studio:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx drizzle-kit studio
